body_html: @SiddGururani Can you check if the CUDA and cuDNN DLLs are in directories named in your %PATH%? It looks like commit 191658d changed the way the CUDA-related DLLs were loaded after the 1.0 release branch was cut, so it's possible (although I'm not exactly sure why) that the library resolution would be different in the two versions.
body_text: @SiddGururani Can you check if the CUDA and cuDNN DLLs are in directories named in your %PATH%? It looks like commit 191658d changed the way the CUDA-related DLLs were loaded after the 1.0 release branch was cut, so it's possible (although I'm not exactly sure why) that the library resolution would be different in the two versions.
body: @SiddGururani Can you check if the CUDA and cuDNN DLLs are in directories named in your `%PATH%`? It looks like commit https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/191658d54f90ac03c15b339326129cd52d1f56a3 changed the way the CUDA-related DLLs were loaded after the 1.0 release branch was cut, so it's possible (although I'm not exactly sure why) that the library resolution would be different in the two versions.
